options_with_invalid_sort = {'url': self._VALID_URL, 'sort': 'invalid'}
with pytest.raises(MissingRequiredOptionException) as err_info:
    RssFeedCreator().create(options_with_invalid_sort, self._EMPTY_SECRET_STORE
        )
self.assertEqual(
    'Sorting value for RSS feed can only be either ascending or descending',
    err_info.value.message)
